subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Two years ago, Miami won 16 games in the playoffs and swilled a champion’s brand of Champagne. This season, saddled with the worst record in basketball, the Heat might not win 16 games.
snippet: Two years ago, Miami won 16 games in the playoffs and swilled a champion’s brand of Champagne. This season, saddled with the worst record in basketball, the Heat might not win 16 games.
